publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1207.1 George Foulkes: Loanhead Community Learning Centre—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1207) in the name of Ian McKee, insert at end "recognises the value which a Labour-led Midlothian Council places on education in stark contrast to the SNP/Liberal Democrat administration in the City of Edinburgh Council; condemns the City of Edinburgh Council for its proposed cuts to the community and learning development budget; is concerned that a review designed to look at organisational efficiencies will ultimately lead to frontline cuts in services and potential job losses, and supports all 44 community centres in the great work that they do across the city of Edinburgh." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-1207.1 George Foulkes: Loanhead Community Learning Centre—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1207) in the name of Ian McKee, insert at end "recognises the value which a Labour-led Midlothian Council places on education in stark contrast to the SNP/Liberal Democrat administration in the City of Edinburgh Council; condemns the City of Edinburgh Council for its proposed cuts to the community and learning development budget; is concerned that a review designed to look at organisational efficiencies will ultimately lead to frontline cuts in services and potential job losses, and supports all 44 community centres in the great work that they do across the city of Edinburgh." Supported by: Sarah Boyack*, Iain Gray*, John Park*, Jackie Baillie*, Elaine Smith*, Mary Mulligan*, Rhona Brankin*, Trish Godman*, Patricia Ferguson*
S3M-1207.1 Loanhead Community Learning Centre (lodged on 24 January 2008) Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-1207.1 Loanhead Community Learning Centre (lodged on 24 January 2008) David Whitton*
